title: Modern Soccer Goalkeeper Training and Coaching Expert Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Soccer Theory and Basic Coaching Methodology
context.additional_context: Development of customized goalkeeper coaching strategies through analysis of actual game situations

learning_goals: Design an integrated technical-tactical training program for goalkeepers (including physical, psychological, and social elements)
Develop personalized training plans based on individual athletes' strengths and weaknesses assessments
Evaluate goalkeepers' decision-making processes during matches using smartphone-based video analysis tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
